review_details: it was a beautiful relaxing day on the fishingboat. altough we were beginners, we caught six fishes. Dimitri has showed us the whole island from the seaside.. After we came back, from the fishingtrip, dimitri showed us a restaurant, where we could let prepear the fish.so we went there for 2 evenings. so with best wishes to dimitri and the people of skiathos, thanks a lot and a good winter
